result.eng: The sample sentences show how to use the words in context.

result.eng: There will be a special edition, the last show of the season.

result.ponchtml: Eagrán ar leiṫ a ḃeas ann seó deireanaċ an tséasúirThere will be a special edition, the last show of the season.

result.eng: What time will the show be on TG4?

result.eng: We are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.
result.ga: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hocht
result.orig: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hocht

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a ḃeas ar siúl anoċt ag a hoċtWe are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.html: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ponchtml: Muirfear ṫú aċ tú ag gaḃáil 'un an ḃaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
